review_title: Wonderful Culture of Faith and Fellowship
pros: Mount Marty offers daily opportunities to grow in faith and an awareness of God. Additionally - the people that are here truly strive to invite you into community. There is a tremendous amount of flexibility for individuals with families - and a significant amount of PTO and Holidays each year. If you're looking for a work environment that values you as more than an employee - this is a great place to be. Most negative comments I have seen associated with MMU tend to be oriented towards disgruntled individuals that make up a very small population of the overall campus culture. This is by no means a perfect institution - but it is growing and working to address faculty and staff concerns.
cons: - Salaries are typically not going to be on the top end of employment opportunities, but raises have been given over the last two years - even in difficult financial years. For many, the "fringe benefits" of flexibility, holidays, and worlplace culture are worth the trade off.

pros: Staff, faculty and students are a pleasure. They are generally grateful for help because most student and faculty are not computer savvy.
